ai-mil7.2.3:1.2_0: “It’s exactly what happens if the door is boiled up by an antelope calves. Then he can draw it back from that offered a large sangha of five-hundred big trees.
ai-mil7.2.3:1.3_0: In the same way, the meditator’s mind should remove the defilements that makes them repay, calling them rooms. It’s shake them off with a large big toe of all goods, oppressing them all down.
ai-mil7.2.3:1.4_0: This is the one of your needs.
ai-mil7.2.3:1.5_0: The senior monk, great king, was telling the Elder Nun Cūḷapanthaka,
ai-mil7.2.3:2.2_0: which leads to the ascetic life.
ai-mil7.2.3:2.4_0: You should kill them again and again.’”
ai-mil7.2.3:3.1_0: The third enquiry (called) the third time,
